body:
Also, after working through how durability checks affect the `show-heartbeat` action, I think we should not throw errors when storage isn't durable, because it makes it difficult to track when a recipe might fail due to durability issues. Specifically for `show-heartbeat`, I had trouble figuring out if it displayed the heartbeat prompt before doing anything with storage.

Instead, I think there should be a "isDurable" method on storage instances that allows recipes to choose when to check for storage durability, to allow them to fail gracefully.

Thoughts?
